title: Aubie CPU (VHDL)
subtitle: 32-bit RISC | ALU • Register File • Control Unit
description: Designed a 32-bit combinational ALU, register file, and control logic using dlx_types and bv_arithmetic. Simulated instruction execution per Aubie CPU spec.

title: OS/161 CPU Scheduler
subtitle: C Simulation | FCFS • Round Robin • SRTF
description: Implemented a time-driven simulation of FCFS, RR, and SRTF. Analyzed turnaround and waiting times; produced Gantt charts and fairness metrics.

title: ShadowLaptop Forensics
subtitle: NTFS Reconstruction & Recovery
description: Manually parsed MFT records to recover hidden files. Validated evidence with hashes and documented stego/obfuscation techniques.

title: Nosj Parser (Java)
subtitle: Secure Serialization
description: Built a secure JSON-like parser supporting BigInteger and strict schema validation. Hardened against typical deserialization pitfalls.

title: CyberForce Blue Team
subtitle: Network Hardening & Incident Response
description: Hardened Linux services, wrote detection rules, and responded to simulated incidents under time pressure.
